alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Fremont County through 300 PM MDT... At 224 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Howard, or 10 miles north of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cotopaxi around 235 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Texas Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft
